title: Exp in jungle needs to increase past a certain point (lvl 8ish)
body:
Pretty pathetic when you consider the fact the following
1. Skuttle is now worth a lot but only one jungler will get the exp
1. Laners will start farming the jungle camps


For the jungler that gets behind due to unforeseen circumstances, they start following behind so bad. It's pretty crazy.

replies.body: I believe the jg goes up in exp also at lvl 7?  The problem is you are so far behind that ganking is nearly impossible.  I mean when you are lvl 6 ... and the bot lvl is 7.  and your mid / top are 8 or 9.  Ganks are really not worth the risk of dying and feeding a lane.

I rarely get behind my bot lane since the change. You need to make sure that you not miss the krug xp because they are the camp which give the most exp. The case when you failling behind is when the other jungler get the lead and control your  jungle.
Jungle levels up to level 7 max, not beyond.
Agree. I main jungle and they have been under expo for a while but this patch really overdid it. I shouldn't be lvl 8 while mid and top are lvl 10 unless im behind.

>
> Agree. I main jungle and they have been under expo for a while but this patch really overdid it. I shouldn't be lvl 8 while mid and top are lvl 10 unless im behind.

yeah as a jungle before this patch i hit lvl 6 slighly after my mid laner and top laner but slightly before my  bot lane..

which u know makes perfect scene, becuase jungle as a solo lanes should be ahead of a duo lane...

now junglers are below the level the support...

jungle never needed any exp changes...
they possibly needed to stop the buff camp buff route by lowering buff exp and raising exp on other camps to compensate, but not being able to hit lvl 3 by ANY 3 camps except krugs is beyond absurd.

Yeah ... they completely over did the nerf.  My common problem now is the mid laner gets lvl 6 when im about lvl 4.  So they enemy tends to ward my JG at lvl 5.  Then as soon as they Ding lvl 6 they come ult me ... and since im lvl 4.  I have literally no counterplay.

This most recent JG nerf was way way way overboard.  Its really insane.
Dueling jungle vs non-dueling jungle means the dueling jungle gets all the scuttles and fucking bot lane is level 6 before you.

> [{quoted}](name=Cerbearus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1cEP7Nbo,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-21T04:15:11.147+0000)
>
> Dueling jungle vs non-dueling jungle means the dueling jungle gets all the scuttles and fucking bot lane is level 6 before you.

Yeah, this is the problem

I know riot put 2 skuttle in the first spawn but the issue comes after the first spawn. Sure, you don't have to get the skuttle, if you know your opponent will be getting it, you can avoid him and gank on the opposite side. The issue is, if there is no gank that can happen especially if you're playing someone like fiddle, you practically just get set behind

I had a few jungle games today just to try it out. I purposely playing Xin and I was constantly ahead of my enemy jungler. His ganks were pitiful because once I was able to obtain 1-2 skuttle over him, i was constantly invading or getting skuttle. I never got a kill on him but he was at one point the same level as the support. 


I cant imagine playing something like Amumu into Xin/WW/Lee

> [{quoted}](name=xJLx MCHammer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1cEP7Nbo,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-05-20T23:32:45.005+0000)
>
> Pretty pathetic when you consider the fact the following
> 1. Skuttle is now worth a lot but only one jungler will get the exp
> 1. Laners will start farming the jungle camps

Just play Midlane {{champion:104}} with {{summoner:11}}. Jungle is a support role now. Time to change roles friends

> For the jungler that gets behind due to unforeseen circumstances.

That's the problem. The other jungler who got his lead would once again be 2-3 lvl above everyone else with an increase in exp and the  jungler who got behind still couldn't keep up with the game.

We don't need a straight up increase, but a neutral change that makes none fall behind that much or even the other way: none should be too far ahead just because he got some rng based jungle camp.
